data.message: Damnnnn everyone still writing their novels full of opinions. 😹 Em doesn't fucking care, get it through your heads. Politics are fixed. Have been since the beginning! Look it up. I'm surprised more people don't realize it. You're wasting your time & energy honestly getting mad over it.

replies.message:
Hi!
No offense: but you're wrong.
When you Google the search term:

"political Eminem lyrics"

the list of hits is endless.
Enjoy your day.

www.google.com
Katrin Blumenfeld that doesn't pertain to what I said at all...

Heather Rose
Feel free to elaborate.
My comments were incredibly clear. 
Should you wish to clarify; be my guest. 
FaceBook is a public forum of one billion unique users. 
Who am I to stop you?

Katrin Blumenfeld I said what I needed to say... looking up "political eminem lyrics" has nothing to do with my first statement... politics are fixed years, sometimes decades ahead of time... look THAT up.

Heather Rose
Pardon me; but I spent four years looking up an assortment of topics at a renowned University to earn a Bachelor's degree.
Then I spent another two years looking up even more information for a host of Graduate credits.
As I said earlier: enjoy your day.
Katrin Blumenfeld they will publish whatever they want in certain books too. They own all the major companies. They're very good at brainwashing

Heather Rose
And how exactly do "they" relate to Eminem?
Katrin Blumenfeld he's a puppet for them obviously... look this shit up damn you're fucking clueless 😹😹😹
